about_the_game:
On Ancient Sands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Chimes Mantra
  • Sand Temple
  • Desert Wyrm

SFX
  • Temple Collapse Small (4)
  • Temple Collapse Medium (4)
  • Temple Collapse Big (4)
  • Temple Collapse Huge (4)
  • Frightening Screech
  • Mine Lever
  • Desert Wyrm Attack (4)
  • Desert Quicksand (4)
  • Psychic Attack
detailed_description:
On Ancient Sands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
